title: Twelve queries of publick concernment humbly submitted to the serious consideration of the Great Councell of the Kingdome. By a cordiall well-wisher to its proceedings.
author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.
publisher: Printed by J.M. for M. Spark at the Bible in Green Arbour,
notes: A cordiall well-wisher to its proceedings = William Prynne.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
